flowRoot.flowPara: Switching off ens3 will break the connection to the server, and will make the administration UI unavaliable.

text.tspan: when the off button is hit, a fullscreen page is brought up with a spinner and a text

flowRoot.flowPara: ens3 Realtek Semiconductor Co., Ltd. RTL-8100/8101L/8139 PCI Fast Ethernet Adapter (QEMU Virtual Machine) 8139cp 52:54:00:49:07:A7

text.tspan: when the off button is hit, a spinner and text is brought up inside the pane
